metadata.title: SATINIOR I Do Nails Nail Tech Cosmetology Apron with Colorful Rhinestone 2 Pieces Waterproof Nail Apron with 3 Pockets
features: Enough to use: you will receive 2 pieces of nail aprons in one package, convenient for your daily wear and replacement, you can share with your friends and parents

Reliable and quality: these nail aprons are mainly made of waterproof cloth and decorated with rhinestone patterns, which are soft and comfortable for you to wear, reliable in quality and long lasting to use, also are easy to clean and machine washable

Practical design: these nail aprons are designed with 3 pockets in the front, which measures approx. 7 x 5 inches, which is convenient for you to hold small tools, cellphones, business cards, hair clips and other things

One size fits most people: these black nail aprons measure approx. 32 inches long, 10 inches wide on the top and 25 inches wide on the bottom, they are designed with neck ties of 35.5 inches in length and adjustable waist ties, which can bring you a snug fit and comfortable wearing

Various occasions supply: these adjustable smock aprons are delicately designed for hair cutting, gardening, baking, cooking, grilling, painting, art crafting and more, suitable for restaurants, cafes, kitchen, back yard, salons and other uses
description: Features:  Cool presents options: Our cute nail aprons are delicate in appearance, suitable for your friends, colleagues, parents or someone who means a lot towards you as a present on anniversary, Valentine's Day, birthday and so on, showing your care and love for them and making them happier.  A beautiful and useful accessory: Our elastic smock aprons are mainly black, you do not have to worry about nail polish will easily dirty it, while the color is very classic, suitable to match most types of your clothes.  Specifications: Material: cloth, rhinestone Color: black Size: one size fits most people  Package includes: 2 x Nail aprons  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist slight difference due to different screen displays.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "12.99 x 10.83 x 0.63 inches; 10.34 Ounces", "Item model number": "Vivid Pattern", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "January 4, 2022"}
